answers.answer: Medical professionals don't always have the answers. A good reason why there is a medhelp community called undiagnosed symptoms. :)
i agree& i cant get anyone to answer my questions!

MedHelp is (to me)  just as confusing as in the doctor's office. but thank you for answering.  by the way, am very curious, is pernicious anemia caused by lacking the instringsic (sp?) factor in the stomach?  is vitamin B12 injections good for that?  I was given that when I was not diagnosed with that anemia.i think doctors go for fads too. lol! sometime ago, it was cinnamon for diabetes.again, thanks
yes, my comments and questions don't seem to be read right.  get stuff not exactly related to my problems.  thanks.

question: I have an issue with this website.    I don't think MedHelp is supposed to replace any medical professional help.
title: replacing medical professional help with this website
